attributes.action: after watching Tony Blair the inside story......stop the Iraq war.....and let the public speak on such issues!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to tell our 'beloved' prime minister Tony Blair, to finally put a stop to this UNJUST war in Iraq.....and for once to actually consult the british public (who he is meant to represent!) on such large issues to do with our nation!....the decisions he has made in his reign as prime minister have done nothing to benefit our beloved nation.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=iraq
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
